Criteria for Direct Grant and Subgrant Eligibility.—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Allocation of, and Limitation on, Grant Funding.—
Publication of Direct Grant and Subgrant Information.—

akn:content.akn:p: (g) The Secretary shall publish annually in the Federal Register and otherwise as the Secretary considers appropriate—

(i) The Secretary, the National Trust, and the State Historic Preservation Officers may, individually or jointly, enter into cooperative agreements with any private nonprofit organization with appropriate expertise in maritime preservation issues, or other qualified maritime preservation organizations, to assist in the administration of the Program.
